entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:56 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:56 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
